descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Volendrung Replacer[/color] v1.0

[color=#ffff00]Credits[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, adaptation

This mod replaces vanilla Volendrung with new model, new textures and new enchantment (Absorb Health 20 pts and Paralyze 3 sec).

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY ONE ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***
